channel.title: How to add portols (508)
channel.description: i wanna add portols that can tele u to somewhere how do i do that??

item.title: How to add portols (508)
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

Objectoption1 and A Portal id?

Basically you do this…

  1. Go into player.java
  2. Paste in something like this…
frames.createGlobalObject(2156, 0, 3222, 3219, 0, 10); //PORTAL
  1. Go to Objectoption1.java
  2. Paste in something like this…
case 2156://PORTAL
setCoords(3240, 3225, 0);

And boom you got a portal, just change the coords and object id freely. What this will do, the one i did, will create a portal in the center of lumbridge, and this portal will teleport you from the center of lumbridge to the lumbridge bridge. Simple huh?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2009, 08:53:47 pm[/size][hr]ill take it it worked.

Read full topic
